entry.title: SPECIAL AIR QUALITY STATEMENT IN EFFECT, La Loche
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:37 AM CST Sunday 08 May 2016

entry.title: Current Conditions: Smoke, 16.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Buffalo Narrows Airport 12:00 PM CST Sunday 08 May 2016
Condition: Smoke
Temperature: 16.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.4 kPa rising
Visibility: 4.8 km
Humidity: 46 %
Dewpoint: 4.9°C
Wind: WNW 34 km/h gust 57 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of showers. High 20. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of showers this afternoon with risk of a thunderstorm. Widespread smoke. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High 20. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Sunday 08 May 2016

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of rain. Low 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of rain overnight. Widespread smoke. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Low 6. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Sunday 08 May 2016

entry.title: Monday: Chance of showers. High 10. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers in the morning and early in the afternoon. Local smoke. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 then light near noon. High 10. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Sunday 08 May 2016

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 3. POP 30%
